member.name: T:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConfig
member.summary: Photon menu config file implements . Stores static options that affect parts of the menu behavior and selectable configurations.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConfig._maxPlayers
member.summary: The maximum player count allowed for all game modes.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConfig._adaptFramerateForMobilePlatform
member.summary: Force 60 FPS during menu animations.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConfig._availableAppVersions
member.summary: The available Photon AppVersions to be selectable by the user. An empty list will hide the related dropdown on the settings screen.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConfig._availableRegions
member.summary: Static list of regions available in the settings. An empty entry symbolizes best region option. An empty list will hide the related dropdown on the settings screen.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConfig._availableScenes
member.summary: Static list of scenes available in the scenes menu. An empty list will hide the related button in the main screen. PhotonMenuSceneInfo.Name = displayed name PhotonMenuSceneInfo.ScenePath = the actual Unity scene (must be included in BuildSettings) PhotonMenuSceneInfo.Preview = a sprite with a preview of the scene (screenshot) that is displayed in the main menu and scene selection screen (can be null)

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConfig._machineId
member.summary: The ScriptableObject that stores local ids to use as an option in for AppVersion. Designed as a convenient development feature. Can be null.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConfig._codeGenerator
member.summary: The ScriptableObject that is required for party code generation. Also used to create random player names.

member.name: P:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConfig.AvailableAppVersions
member.summary: Return the available app versions.

member.name: P:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConfig.AvailableRegions
member.summary: Returns the available regions.

member.name: P:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConfig.AvailableScenes
member.summary: Returns the available scenes.

member.name: P:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConfig.MaxPlayerCount
member.summary: Returns the max player count.

member.name: P:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConfig.MachineId
member.summary: Returns an id that should be unique to this machine.

member.name: P:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConfig.CodeGenerator
member.summary: Returns the code generator.

member.name: P:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConfig.AdaptFramerateForMobilePlatform
member.summary: Returns true if the framerate should be adapted for mobile platforms to force the menu animations to run at 60 FPS.

member.name: T:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuMachineId
member.summary: A scriptable object that has an id used by the QuantumMenu as AppVersion. Mostly a development feature to ensure to only meet compatible clients in the Photon matchmaking.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuMachineId.Id
member.summary: An id that should be unique to this machine, used by the QuantumMenu as AppVersion. An explicit asset importer is used to create local ids during import (see QuantumMenuMachineIdImporter).

member.name: T:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuImageFitter
member.summary: To support any sprite aspect ratio in landscape and portrait mode this script calculates new image sizes aligned to the top/bottom or left/right without changing the aspect ratio. Any changes in the resolution of the parent rect (Editor resize, screen orientation, etc) will result in a recalculation.

member.name: M:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuImageFitter.Awake
member.summary: Unity Awake method, cache transforms and image.

member.name: M:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuImageFitter.OnResolutionChanged
member.summary: A Unity message that will recalculate the aspect ratio when the resolution changes.

member.name: M:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuImageFitter.Start
member.summary: Unity Start method.

member.name: M:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuImageFitter.Update
member.summary: Unity Update method.

member.name: T:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuUIController
member.summary: All screens are registed by this controller in the list. Every screen gets a reference of this controller, the assigned and wrapper. The first screen in the list is the screen that is shown on app start. Controller is used to progress from one screen to another . E.g. Show<QuantumMenuUILoading>(). When deriving a screen the base type will still be functionally to use for Get() and Show(). But only the derived type or the base are useable.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuUIController._config
member.summary: The menu config.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuUIController.Connection

member.summary: The list of screens. The first one is the default screen shown on start.

member.summary: The current active screen.

member.summary: Current connection args. Shared by all screens.

member.summary: Unity awake method. Populates internal structures based on the list.

member.summary: The Unity start method to enable the default screen.

member.name: T:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuUIParty
member.summary: The party screen shows two modes. Creating a new game or joining a game with a party code. After creating a game the session party code can be optained via the ingame menu. One speciality is that a region list is requested from the connection when entering the screen in order to create a matching session codes.

member.name: T:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConnectArgs
member.summary: The connection options selected by the client which are operated on directly from . The menu screens all have the same instance of this object. Fields marked with HideInInspector should not show editable in the inspector. Fields marked with NonSerialized should not be serialized anywhere and only be set during runtime, e.g. by .
Quantum specific arguments to start the Quantum simulation after connecting to Photon.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConnectArgs.Username
member.summary: The username configured in the menu.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConnectArgs.Session
member.summary: The session that the client wants to join. Is not persisted. Use ReconnectionInformation instead to recover it between application shutdowns.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConnectArgs.PreferredRegion
member.summary: The preferred region the user selected in the menu.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConnectArgs.Region
member.summary: The actual region that the client will connect to.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConnectArgs.AppVersion
member.summary: The app version used for the Photon connection.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConnectArgs.MaxPlayerCount
member.summary: The max player count that the user selected in the menu.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConnectArgs.Scene
member.summary: The map or scene information that the user selected in the menu.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConnectArgs.Creating
member.summary: Toggle to create or join-only game sessions/rooms.

member.name: M:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConnectArgs.LoadFromPlayerPrefsUser(System.String)
member.summary: Load members from Player Prefs

member.name: M:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConnectArgs.SaveToPlayerPrefsUser(System.String)
member.summary: Save members from Player Prefs

member.name: M:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConnectArgs.SetDefaultsUser(Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConfig)
member.summary: Set all values to their default.

member.name: M:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConnectArgs.LoadFromPlayerPrefs(System.String)
member.summary: Save the class to Unity player prefs. Will create a new instance if loading fails. Will run if config is set.

member.name: M:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConnectArgs.SaveToPlayerPrefs(System.String)
member.summary: Saves the instance to Unity player prefs.

member.name: M:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConnectArgs.SetDefaults(Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConfig)
member.summary: Make sure that all configuration have a default settings.

member.name: P:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConnectArgs.AppSettings
member.summary: Getter to retrieve Photon Realtime from

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConnectArgs.AuthValues
member.summary: Photon Realtime authentication settings.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConnectArgs.Client
member.summary: (optional) Photon Realtime connection object for reconnection.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConnectArgs.PhotonPluginName
member.summary: The Photon plugin name. Default is "QuantumPlugin".

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConnectArgs.QuantumClientId
member.summary: The Quantum client id. This is a secret between the client and the server and should not be shared with anyone else. It does not have to be the Photon UserId for example. It's used to reclaim the same player slot after a reconnection. If null, the is used.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConnectArgs.Reconnecting
member.summary: Set to true to try to perform a reconnect. must be available then.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConnectArgs.ReconnectInformation
member.summary: The reconnection information used to try to reconnect quickly to the same room.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConnectArgs.RuntimeConfig
member.summary: The runtime config of the Quantum simulation. Every client sends theirs to the server. This is controlled by .

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConnectArgs.RuntimePlayers
member.summary: The RuntimePlayer which are automatically added to the simulation after is started. When empty a default player is created when connecting.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConnectArgs.SessionConfig
member.summary: The session config used for the simulation. Every client sends theirs to the server. If null the global config will be searched.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConnectArgs.ServerSettings
member.summary: The server settings file used for the connection attempts. If null the global config will be searched.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConnectArgs.ShutdownFlags
member.summary: Fine-tune what internals gets disposed when the connection is terminated.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConnectArgs.RecordingFlags
member.summary: Start Quantum game in recording mode.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConnectArgs.InstantReplaySettings
member.summary: Instant replay settings.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConnectArgs.DeltaTimeType
member.summary: How to update the session using . Default is EngineDeltaTime.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.QuantumMenuConnectArgs.StartGameTimeoutInSeconds
member.summary: A client timeout for the Quantum start game protocol, measured in seconds. Large snapshots and/or slow webhooks could make this go above the default value of 10 sec. Configure this value appropriately.

member.name: T:Quantum.Menu.ConnectResult
member.summary: Connection result info object.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.ConnectResult.Success
member.summary: Is successful

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.ConnectResult.FailReason
member.summary: The fail reason code

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.ConnectResult.DisconnectCause
member.summary: Another custom code that can be filled by out by RealtimeClient.DisconnectCause for example.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.ConnectResult.DebugMessage
member.summary: A debug message.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.ConnectResult.CustomResultHandling
member.summary: Set to true to disable all error handling by the menu.

member.name: F:Quantum.Menu.ConnectResult.WaitForCleanup
member.summary: An optional task to signal the menu to wait until cleanup operation have completed (e.g. level unloading).

member.name: M:Quantum.Menu.ConnectResult.Ok
member.summary: Creates a successful result.

member.name: M:Quantum.Menu.ConnectResult.Fail(System.Int32,System.String,System.Threading.Tasks.Task)
member.summary: Create a failed result.
member.param: Should the receiving code wait unil the connection or the scene has been cleaned up.
